Michael Benson is a journalist, artist, and  filmmaker including the award-winning *Predictions of Fire (1995)*. His work has been published in The New York Times, The Atlantic, Rolling Stone, the New Yorker, Smithsonian and The Nation and he has been a television (CNN) and radio (NPR) reporter. He lives in New York City. 

*From Abrams Books [[1]] [[2]]*
